parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME| , Freyya told me about you and convinced me to let him enter my city and explore my land, but I was told that you want something more, I hope you're not going crazy and want to get into the city of jaxthan, he Even suspicious of his own shadow, only me and freyya have the capacity to convince him, but you have to prove me that you deserve my help, say {mission} if you want to continue.
